description: This file contains mock class definitions for testing Dobby proxy and IPC service interfaces using Google Mock. It includes mock methods for container management operations and IPC interactions, primarily used for unit testing components that depend on these interfaces.

classes.name: DobbyProxyMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the IDobbyProxy interface for unit testing Dobby container operations.

classes.name: IpcServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the IIpcService interface for testing IPC interactions.

methods.name: shutdown
methods.description: Mocks the shutdown method for the Dobby proxy.

methods.name: ping
methods.description: Mocks the ping method for the Dobby proxy.

methods.name: isAlive
methods.description: Mocks the isAlive check method for the Dobby proxy.

methods.name: setLogMethod
methods.description: Mocks setting log method in the Dobby proxy.

methods.name: setLogLevel
methods.description: Mocks setting log level in the Dobby proxy.

methods.name: setAIDbusAddress
methods.description: Mocks setting D-Bus address in the Dobby proxy.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Mocks retrieving container state.

methods.name: startContainerFromSpec
methods.description: Mocks starting a container from a JSON spec.

methods.name: startContainerFromBundle
methods.description: Mocks starting a container from a bundle path.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Mocks stopping a container.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Mocks pausing a container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Mocks resuming a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Mocks hibernating a container.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Mocks waking up a container.

methods.name: addContainerMount
methods.description: Mocks adding a mount to a container.

methods.name: removeContainerMount
methods.description: Mocks removing a mount from a container.

methods.name: addAnnotation
methods.description: Mocks adding an annotation to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Mocks removing an annotation from a container.

methods.name: execInContainer
methods.description: Mocks executing a command inside a container.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Mocks registering a state change listener.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Mocks unregistering a listener.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Mocks retrieving information about a container.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Mocks listing all containers.
